video_title: Helping Someone With Depression - Dr Julie #shorts
transcript:
here's a quick tip from a psychologist
if you're trying to help someone with
depression be careful you don't fall
into that trap of becoming the rescuer
scooping somebody up can make you feel
better but when you treat someone as
fragile and you start taking on
responsibilities that they're still
managing to do for themselves you can
actually disempower and de-skill that
person and they lose even more
confidence in themselves instead it's
better to help by supporting them to do
the things that they need to do for
their recovery
